include(FetchContent)

FetchContent_Declare(
        fuzztest
        GIT_REPOSITORY https://github.com/google/fuzztest.git
        GIT_TAG main
        GIT_SHALLOW TRUE
        SYSTEM
)

FetchContent_Declare(
        googletest
        GIT_REPOSITORY https://github.com/google/googletest.git
        GIT_TAG        v1.14.0
        GIT_SHALLOW TRUE
        SYSTEM
)
